title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the problem, refer to the code located in tests/new/binaryWarnings/. Please note that these tests may yield false positives due to the absence of filename checking during harness verification of messages. (In AJDT, filenames that make no sense to AJDT may be omitted.)
OB: The source path in declare warning messages for targeting .class files from injars is displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. It has also been observed that filenames may not appear at all, although these tests do not reproduce that problem.
EB: The source path in declare warning messages for targeting .class files from injars is displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
